sentence.Network_en: I sat inconspicuously in a corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不起眼地坐在角落里。

sentence.Network_en: Inconspicuously, I edged along the baseball field, then slipped into underbrush.
sentence.Network_cn: 我躲躲闪闪地沿着棒球场的边缘向前走, 随后又消消地溜进了灌木丛.

sentence.Network_en: She left the room as inconspicuously as possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 她尽可能做到不声不响地离开房间.

...隐芒果蛛（学名：Mangora inconspicus）为园蛛科芒果蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于甘肃等地。该物种的模式产地在甘肃。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Mangora inconspicus}.

...a>(Acetobacteraceti)和巴氏醋杆菌(Acetobacter pasteurianus)，其中最主要的是木醋杆菌。酵母菌有酿酒酵母(Saccharomyces cerevisiae)、不显酵母(Saccharomyces inconspicus)、路德类酵母(Saccharomycodes ludwigii)、粟酒裂殖酵母(Schizosaccharomyces pombe)、热带假丝酵母(Candida tropicans)、克鲁斯.

entry.tran: 不引人注目的;不惹人注意的
entry.def: Someone who is inconspicuous does not attract attention to themselves.

example.ex: I'll try to be as inconspicuous as possible...
He had ridden out of Cambridge, inconspicuous among the hundreds of young cyclists.
example.tran: 他已骑车出了剑桥,淹没在几百名年轻的自行车手当中。

entry.def: Something that is inconspicuous is not easily seen or does not attract attention because it is small, ordinary, or hidden away.

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner intended to avoid attracting attention;

auth_sentence.content: When he was gone, Henrietta, being his only sister, might keep his picture about somewhere, inconspicuously.
auth_sentence.res_content: When he was gone, Henrietta, being his only sister, might keep his picture about somewhere, inconspicuously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When he was gone, Henrietta, being his only sister, might keep his picture about somewhere, inconspicuously.
